sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Remove update_sync from ais_search_profile_relevancy_model</description> <name>Remove update_sync from Relevancy Model</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[gs.log('Fix AisSearchProfileRelevancyModelAttr: Remove update_synch attribute'); SNC.DictionaryAttribute.remove("ais_search_profile_relevancy_model", "", "update_synch"); gs.log('Fix AisSearchProfileRelevancyModelAttr: Completed remove attribute');]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-30 19:06:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>68e26f61773460102d71af61681061f3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Remove update_sync from Relevancy Model</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="AI Search" source="com.glide.ais">eb04fc283c31311068bcf327dfe37f93</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_68e26f61773460102d71af61681061f3</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-30 19:06:38</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
